title: WTB: N172 Art Whitney with Dog
author: packs

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Art Whitney with Dog
posts.post_content:
Not interested in technical grades at all. What I want is a Whitney with dog that has nice eye appeal. 

If you have one for sale, please pm me

Bump. Let me know if you have one for sale. I'm interested in cards people want to sell. I would prefer not to get a message telling me you have one but would only sell it for the right price. I want to buy the card from someone who wants to sell it.
